title: WTB T206 Johnson portrait, low grade
author: Woundedduck

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Johnson portrait, low grade
posts.post_content:
This is the card I've been waiting for and I've been holding off buying anything else until I can get one.  I'm hoping for something with decent eye appeal in an SGC 10-20 range or PSA/BVG equivalent.  I don't mind raw either or even Authentic grade if it's slightly trimmed, but still has good eye appeal.  My budget isn't huge so I'm looking in the $200-$300 range.


Here's a few examples of around what I'm looking for
[url]http://www.cardtarget.com/cgi-bin/gm_price_history.cgi?cardID=1677127995&variation=all&grader=all&grade=1&submit=Display[/url]
